alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 08 at 9:30AM CDT until August 08 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR NORTHERN DE KALB AND NORTHERN OGLE COUNTIES... At 930 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported road closures continue due to flooding in the Byron area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Doppler radar indicates that heavy rainfall has begun to diminish across the area, which will allow flooding to begin to recede within the next few hours. HAZARD...Flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Rapid-onset flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses, as well as other poor drainage and low lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sycamore, Genoa, Byron, Oregon, Mount Morris, Davis Junction, Kirkland, Forreston, Kingston, Stillman Valley, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Leaf River, Fairdale, Adeline and Baileyville. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
